settings.text: Give customers details about the banner image(s) or content on the template.

settings.heading: Delivery matters
settings.row_content:
Delivery Methods 

Answer: Smaller Orders will be sent with Grab. Any bigger order will be sent with a logistic partner. 

 

Delivery Time  

Answer: This depends on the availability of the products, the order size as well as the customer location.  

 

Delivery Costs 

Answer: Depends on the order size as well as the customer location.

settings.heading: Payment matters
settings.row_content:
What are the methods I can pay with? 

Answer: You are able to pay with credit card, direct transfer as well as MoMo. 

 

Where to I receive an invoice? 

Answer: the invoice will be sent via mail.

settings.heading: My Account
settings.row_content:
How can I create an Account? 

Answer: You can create an account by going to “Log In” and click on “create an account”.

 

Where do I change my password? 

Answer: Change your password within your account settings.

 

What can I do when I forget my password? 

Answer: Click on “Forgot password” when you are trying to login.

 

How to change my address? 

Answer: You can change or add an address within the account settings.

settings.heading: My Orders
settings.row_content:
Where do I receive my order confirmation? 

Answer: You will receive your order confirmation via mail. If you haven’t received your order confirmation within 24h please contact our support service. 

 

Where Can I view my order history? 

Answer: You can find your order history within your account. Follow the link to view your order history. 

 

How long does my order take? 

Answer: This depends on the availability of the products, the order size as well as the customer location. You can track your order with the link within the order confirmation. 

 

Can I return my order? 

Answer: No, our products cannot be returned.
